title: It’s Never Too Late
description:
We’ve all heard of the “overnight success” — but usually, chasing your dreams isn’t that easy. It takes a lot of hard work, tough decisions, and sometimes many, many detours. That’s what it took for Carlos Foglia. And now, he’s living the dream.

Follow Carlos on Twitter and online

Listen ad free with Wondery+. Join Wondery+ for exclusives, binges, early access, and ad free listening. Available in the Wondery App. 

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes

--
